files:
- dxwnd: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/dxwnd/Latest%20build/v2_05_18_build.rar
- script1: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Heart%20of%20Darkness/local.sh
game:
  args: /r:0
  exe: drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    requires: bin/HODWin32.exe
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/HODCD
    src: $DISC
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/HODCD
    src: script1
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/HODCD/local.sh
- execute:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/HODCD/local.sh
- task:
    args: /desktop=HeartOfDarkness,1024x780 $GAMEDIR/drive_c/HODCD/HeartOfDarkness.EXE
    description: Running setup of the game. Just proceed and keep all settings at
      their defaults
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/windows/explorer.exe
    name: wineexec
    include_processes: explorer.exe
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd
    file: dxwnd
- write_config:
    data:
      target:
        cdvol0: 100
        codepage0: 0
        coord0: 3
        country0: 0
        dflag0: 0
        dflagb0: 0
        expert: 1
        fakec0: None
        faked0: None
        filterid0: 0
        flag0: 673185825
        flagg0: 1207959568
        flagh0: 22
        flagi0: 138444804
        flagj0: 4224
        flagk0: 65536
        flagl0: 0
        flagm0: 0
        flagn0: 17825796
        flago0: 0
        flagp0: 8192
        flagq0: 0
        icon0: 
        initresh0: 600
        initresw0: 800
        initts0: 0
        initx0: 0
        inity0: 0
        lang0: 0
        launchpath0: C:\Program Files (x86)\Heart Of Darkness\HODWin32.exe
        maxddinterface0: 7
        maxfps0: 0
        maxres0: -1
        maxx0: 0
        maxy0: 0
        minx0: 0
        miny0: 0
        module0: None
        monitorid0: -1
        notes0: None
        opengllib0: None
        path0: C:\Program Files (x86)\Heart Of Darkness\HODWin32.exe
        posx0: 50
        posy0: 50
        registry0: None
        renderer0: 3
        scanline0: 0
        sizx0: 800
        sizy0: 600
        slowratio0: 2
        startfolder0: C:\Program Files (x86)\Heart Of Darkness\
        swapeffect0: 0
        tflag0: 0
        title0: Heart of Darkness
        ver0: 0
        winver0: 0
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.ini
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- move:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/HODCD
wine:
  Desktop: true
